thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A real gem of a hotel
thread.title_full: A real gem of a hotel - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ian F
title: A real gem of a hotel
text:
We loved the location, the Maroccan theme, and the cosy feel of the Casablanca. The staff were very helpful, the room was very clean quiet and comfortable. The continental breakfast was good, and the complementary evening wine and cheese was a nice touch.
Room Tip: We stayed in a courtyard room which was quiet See more room tips
